description: Working as a freelance consultant to deliver a bespoke Software Engineering product for internal development, as part of the Launchpad programme.
experiences: Designed and built a responsive events website. Key features include Google Calendar API integration to add events to your Google Calendar, a social feature to view all users that are attending an event and role specific pages e.g. an admin-only Create Event page.

Planning stage involved events app and API research, user stories, UI designs and a React architecture diagram (showing components, state management, context API, props, routing and API HTTP methods/endpoints).

description: Full-time award winning coding bootcamp training. Pair programming, solo sprints and team projects meant practical hands-on experience of front-end and back-end development.
experiences: Team project building a Full-Stack React Native Mobile App using the MERN stack, Expo, and Google Maps API. We had a great team dynamic; planning, spiking, pair-programming, and testing effectively; completing the app comfortably within the 3-week deadline; and successfully passing real-time user testing for the Android (APK) build.
